typeName.description: The name of the type. Descriptive name to be used in the UI

name.description: The name of the attribute. Descriptive name to be used in the UI

type.description: The type of the attribute. One of: Text, Number, Date, Boolean, Reference

multiplicity.description: The multiplicity of the attribute, which means how many values can be stored in the attribute. One of: '0..1', '1', '1..*', '*'

description.description: Description of the attribute. Descriptive text to be used in the UI
